name: Trial of the Bush Doctor
description:
Don't even ask. 

Contains 

  • Hectic 3d movement mechanics (glide, grapple, slingshot) 
  • Hectic 3d combat (shooting, slashing, crying)
  • Plague Doctor robots that shoot purple drink at you 
  • Platforming 
  • Fighting 
  • Growing trees
  • Farming mechanical faces 

I told you already, don't ask.
